description: Data was extracted from the GDC on December 2018. MicroRNA isoform-level expression data. More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Release_Notes/Data_Release_Notes/#data-release-140

fields.description: Original TARGET case barcode, eg TARGET-20-PASCGR
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Unique miRNA id (aka symbol), eg hsa-mir-21  --  relevant reference information can be found in the isb-cgc:genome_reference dataset in the tables miRBase_v21 and miRBase_v21_hsa_gff3
fields.name: mirna_id

fields.description: The mature miRNA accession id (eg MIMAT0000062) -- note that this can also be null, in the event that this read does not map to a mature portion of the miRNA
fields.name: mirna_accession

fields.description: The type of transcript -- either mature, precursor, unannotated, or stemloop  (if this value is not mature, then the mirna_accession field will be null)
fields.name: mirna_transcript

fields.description: Chromosome, possible values: chr1-22, and chrX
fields.name: chromosome

fields.description: Either + or - to denote whether read mapped to the sense (+) or anti-sense (-) strand
fields.name: strand

fields.description: Number of reads that were mapped to this mirna_id
fields.name: read_count

fields.description: Read count normalized by total reads mapped divided by 1 million
fields.name: reads_per_million_miRNA_mapped

fields.description: A short isomiR read may map exactly to mature strands whose sequences are similar but not identical, when the read sequence does not capture the bases that distinguish these miRNAs (e.g. hsa-mir-30a at 6q13 and hsa-mir-30e at 1p34.2, which differ at position 18). We report such a <line_feed> read as cross-mapped, and we increment the read count for each MIMAT that it mapped to. Either Y or N -- fewer than 2% are Y
fields.name: cross_mapped

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this file (corresponds to the file_barcode)  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba13
fields.name: file_gdc_id

fields.description: GDC unique identifier for this case (corresponds to the case_barcode)  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this:   https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba13
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this aliquot (corresponds to the aliquot_barcode), eg 7fbfdb3e-1fd2-4206-8d2e-7f68e4a15844  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: aliquot_gdc_id
